chunk_text: I tried a more advanced method first. I took the 19 images into VisualSFM to produce a .nvm file and a .ply for a dense point cloud. My steps: 1. I ran VisualSFM to compute camera poses and 3D points (the point cloud). 2. This gave me an .nvm file with camera intrinsics, extrinsics, and the 3D points in the scene. 3. I wrote an NvmParser script in Unity to read the .nvm file, parse cameras, and identify green points (like the USB cable).
